specifications_and_testing.highlight: v1.6.0-beta.0 spec release published with major EPBS updates
Process withdrawals tests blocked; function complexity concerns raised
Fork choice tests delayed; anti-slot edge cases documented in HackMD
Fusaka KZG commitments access pattern incompatible with EPBS implementation
Latest execution payload header removed; replaced with payload bid due to circular dependency

implementation_progress.highlight: Prism: Implementing beta.0; status assessment in two weeks
Teku: Containers and block processing complete; passing reference tests
Lodestar: BPS refactoring done; containers and constants implemented
Grandine: Beacon chain changes complete; fork choice adaptation in progress

devnet_planning.highlight: DevNet-0 based on v1.6.0-beta.0; ETH PandaOps branch due end of October
DevNet-0 will run without blobs; DataColumnSidecar slot field not critical

action_items.action: Provide epbs-devnet-0 branch to ETH PandaOps by end of October
Convert fork-choice node from SSZ container to data class

decisions.decision: Replaced latest_execution_payload_header with latest_execution_payload_bid to resolve circular dependency

targets.target: End of October - epbs-devnet-0 branch delivery to ETH PandaOps
Two weeks - Next EPBS breakout call with status updates
